Smarter." animation_type=""][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][vc_row_inner][vc_column_inner width="1/3" css=".vc_custom_1522834534176{margin-bottom: 40px !important;}"][CleverDemoBox style="inline-2" title="Catalog Mode" description="Choose to turn off the eCommerce functionality of the theme, and use WooCommerce for cataloging purposes instead. It can be easily turned on or off from the Customizer, which makes it ideal of you decide to start SELLING online at a later time." animation_type=""][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width="1/3" css=".vc_custom_1522834539168{margin-bottom: 40px !important;}"][CleverDemoBox style="inline-2" title="Tailored Quick View" description="Shoppers love to get a good visual sense of the product before purchasing. It's compatible with most of SEO plugins (especially with SEO Yoast Plugin)" animation_type=""][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width="1/3" css=".vc_custom_1522834576084{margin-bottom: 40px !important;}"][CleverDemoBox style="inline-2" title="Reliable Support" description="We care about our clients very much.
